item.title: HOES - Help On Every Street will be at Mutiny Information Cafe...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

HOES - Help On Every Street will be at Mutiny Information Cafe this Sunday 4/11 for a donations drive!

See OP for what they're collecting

HOES - Help On Every Street

We will be collecting donations outside of Mutiny Café this Sunday, April 11th, from 9am-5pm. Come see us to drop things off and/or pick up some free educationa...l resources about Mutual Aid, Homelessness in Denver, AAVE, Queer-Inclusive language, and more. Don’t forget to stop inside for a coffee drink!

Items requested:

Hygiene supplies
Tents
Sleeping bags
Wipes
Reusable bags
Reusable water bottles
Make up
Hand sanitizer
Socks
Art supplies
Can openers
Portable food
Jewellery
Tarps
Pillows
Blankets
Camping stoves
New underwear
Bras
Shoes

"On Saturday from 11am - 2pm in Civic Center Park, we will be selling communist books, t-shirts, and pins, with all proceeds going to feed the homeless.

Come thru for live entertainment, vendors, food, and a speech from special guest, Lynette Fox, the mother of Jesse Cedillo, who was murdered by Pueblo police last year.

item.title: Denver Action NetworkDenver CommunistsLast night, 300 demonstrated against racist, misogynist violence against Asian-Americans in an area...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkDenver Communists

Last night, 300 demonstrated against racist, misogynist violence against Asian-Americans in an area once home to Denver’s Chinatown, before it was destroyed by ...racist whites in an 1880 race riot.

Unlike an earlier demonstration that featured the chief of police as a speaker, the politics from the front were on-point, thanks to the main organizer, a comrade who was in the streets all last summer and fall in the Black Lives Matter movement.

After weeks of relative hibernation, it was great to stand with the dedicated anti-racists we’ve gotten to know through the George Floyd Rebellion, as well as a lot of new faces outraged by the recent violence against Asian women.

See More

item.title: Denver Action NetworkWITCH DenverActivist training via Civil Liberties Defense Center April 1, 2021 2:00 p.m. MT — 4:00 p.m. MT...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkWITCH Denver

Activist training via Civil Liberties Defense Center

April 1, 2021
2:00 p.m. MT — 4:00 p.m. MT
Webinar--information provided upon registration

...

With Indigenous resistance to the Line 3 pipeline that threatens Anishnaabe land (known as Minnesota) heating up, and the movement for Black Lives likely to ramp back up in the wake of continued police brutality, organizers on the ground should be prepared for potential arrests. Solidarity tactics keep individuals from being singled out, & can result in better jail & court outcomes while building movements’ power.

Message us for the registration link!

item.title: Denver Action NetworkFront Range Community Defense...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkFront Range Community Defense Collective

🦄🏳️‍⚧🦙🏳️‍🌈🏴⚠️ALERT!⚠️🏴🏳️‍🌈🦙🏳️‍⚧🦄

The Tenacious Unicorn Ranch is under attack by local bigots and militia. They have threatened violence, publicly, to us and tho...se that help or associate with us. They have encroach on our property, armed, at night, with the intent to harm those of us that live here. We need help, we are not a militia, we are trans folk providing a safe haven for the queer community on an alpaca ranch. This threat has stripped us of our ability to work off ranch and to go about our lives. Financial aid will be used for our security needs.

Also to ensure our animals and residents are ok through this appalling show of bigoted violence. Volunteers are always appreciated to help keep everyone safe as we put security measures in place. We could not be a haven for trans folk without the love of our community, thank you all for your support and solidarity in this most trying time."

— The Tenacious Unicorn Ranch
@TenaciousRanch on Twitter

Who keeps us safe? WE KEEP US SAFE!

Source: https://twitter.com/TenaciousRa…/status/1368996977959047168…

Fundraiser: https://www.gofundme.com/f/23ihgxnlc0

item.title: PHONE ACTION Demand freedom for all! #ChingaLaMigra
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

PHONE ACTION

Demand freedom for all! #ChingaLaMigra

Abolish ICE Denver

We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien Pham from being deported to Vietnam. Tien is being held at a staging center used by ICE in Arizon...a. We hope to get a large number of calls made to the ICE Detention Center in Aurora Colorado from where his case is being managed.

Please also share widely! Here's information for the call:

Call ICE: 720-873-2899 then 1
Tien Pham

"Hi, my name is ____ and I represent ____ (organization, or city/county where you live). I am calling in strong support of Tien Pham #74515548 who is in transit, while his case continues to be managed from your office. Tien Pham is a refugee from Vietnam.,who spent years in a refugee camp and resettled into San Jose, CA after fleeing his war-torn country. After working hard to be found suitable for parole, Tien was transferred your facility. We’re asking for his deportation order to be reversed and he be allowed to join his family who welcome his return."

Denver Action Network

Mayor Michael B. Hancock loves spending your tax money to send his heartless kop goons to assault your neighbors

Tell him to #EndTheSweeps!

Denver Homeless Out Loud

The city continues to SWEEP encampments AGAINST CDC guidelines during a PANDEMIC! They have not learned that sweeping people does not work! DOTI has planned TH...REE SWEEPS THIS WEEK! Wednesday 2/24 at 27th and Marion, Thursday 2/25 at Colfax and Washington, and Friday 2/26 at 10th and Cherokee/Bannock.The SWEEPS will begin each day at 6:30 a.m.
Please come and support our unhoused community members as they demand real housing or places where they are allowed to survive.
Bring the following things to assist residents:

-Truck, or any vehicle to help move
-Carts
-Bungee Cords
-Rope
-Trash Bags
-Food
-Coffee/CoCo
-Water

Your assistance is much appreciated! Somewhere around 6:30am and all morning help will likely be needed.

Toward Rights, Dignity and Housing…

info@denverhomelessoutloud.org
720-940-5291

item.title: Report Back From #J20
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

Report Back From #J20

Denver Communists

Before the BLM-Antifa #J20 action last week, the Denver Police hovered around Cheesman Park and harassed protestors as they arrived. Without citing them for any... crime, they took some comrades’ helmets and told them they could collect them from the police station later if they provided ID.

This also happened at the BLM-Antifa Soup Drive, when the cops took various comrades’ first aid supplies, water, helmets, and PPE. Clearly they did not treat the right wing that way that day, as evidenced by the bear-mace attack by Lee Keltner, the only violence that day that was not in self-defense. Keltner also carried a poorly concealed handgun and his son, an extendable baton.

The state likes to maintain its monopoly on violence, though it makes exceptions for the rich, the white, and the right wing. Far-right vigilante violence has always complimented the project of the racist, settler-colonial state. Whereas our project is to smash that state. There’s a reason for the double standard.

On #J20, when the cops tried to shake them down, our comrades Redd and Kountry of We The People 303 didn’t go quietly. They live-streamed the encounter, refused to have their belongings searched, and said they knew their rights. The cops arrested them, held them until the day’s festivities died down, and charged them for pepperspray and a belt buckle in the shape of non-functioning brass knuckles. And they asked Redd and Kountry if they were members of the Denver Communists. (Not yet! And don’t fuck up our recruitment game, pigs!)

We expect Redd and Kountry will beat these bogus charges, but they may need a lawyer to do so. If you can, please throw a little help their way:

Venmo Redd at @WeThePeople303
Cash App Kountry at @ $arizzle23

Here’s video of the arrests from two different points-of-view, including Redd’s:

https://twitter.com/WethePeople…/status/1351951978507558912…

https://www.facebook.com/wethepeople303/videos/259202422380112/

See More
